commit message: Added missing javadoc and named method params by their interfaces.
Throw a checked exception if getMinBuffer returned an invalid value.
Fixed a bug that caused an uninitialized track to be played.
Check if we are in multi panel mode once in onCreateView
Check if we are in multi panel mode once in onCreateView
Correctly move the options menu preparation to onCreateOptionsMenu instead of onPrepare as invalidateOptionsMenu will call onCreateOptionsMenu again.
Use setRetainInstance so the fragments transition will also work after orientation.
